titles.title: Expressing support for designation of May 2011 as National Huntington's Disease Awareness Month.
Expressing support for designation of May 2011 as National Huntington's Disease Awareness Month.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Expresses support for the designation of National Huntington's Disease Awareness Month.
Recognizes the 10th anniversary of the Senate joint resolution and presidential proclamation recognizing that month.
